00096 class snort : public cc_plugin {
00097 public:
00098     snort(std::string plugin_id,
00099           std::map<std::string,std::string> properties);
00100     virtual ~snort(void);
00101     virtual bool generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00102                                                   DDS_DynamicData *data);
00103     virtual std::string plugin_class()
00104     {
00105         return "snort";
00106     }
00107 
00108 private:
00109     bool initialize_plugin(std::map<std::string, std::string> properties);  
00110 
00111     void update_alertsmap(void);
00112     bool is_newer(std::string timestamp);
00113     date get_date_from_timestamp(std::string timestamp);
00114     std::vector<std::string> split_string(std::string str, char element);
00115 
00116     int this_year_;
00117     int domain_id_;
00118     date latest_date_;
00119     std::map<std::string, struct ids_alert_without_timestamp> alert_map_;
00120     
00121     std::string log_file_;
00122     sigar_t *sig_;
00123     char hostname_[SIGAR_MAXHOSTNAMELEN];
00124       
00125 };

00138 extern "C" cc_plugin* create_snort(std::string plugin_id,
00139                                    std::map<std::string,std::string> properties) {
00140     return new snort(plugin_id,properties);
